resources.string: Get more info about this app

Here is the information about the sudoku solver app! 
The first step to start solving the sudoku is to insert it to the application. That can be done under the insert page. 
1. Click '%1$s' 
2. Click on a selected cell, and the number of choice 

After inserting all the numbers you know, you can solve it, and reveal the numbers of your choice! 
1. Click '%2$s' 
2. You will be sent to the solved sudoku 
3. Click on a selected cell to reveal the number underneath 

You can save your sudoku in any part of the possess. Both before solving, and after revealing any of the cells. 

If you want to come back later and continue on you sudoku, you can find it in the file chooser page. 
1. Click '%3$s', this can be done both from the main page, and the menu bar 
2. All your saved sudokus will now be displayed. Click on the selected one 
3. You can now keep revealing the numbers, and keep solving!
